DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether rAHF-PFM safe effective treatment hemophilia A subject . The study consist 2 part : Part 1 pharmacokinetic safety study , Part 2 evaluation efficacy safety . The study open patient complete Baxter Study 069901 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Pharmacokinetics , Efficacy Safety Recombinant Protein-Free Factor VIII ( rAHF-PFM ) Hemophilia A Patients - A Continuation Clinical Study 069901
DOC.criteria: Subject complete Baxter protocol 069901 Subject HIV1 seronegative , HIV1 seropositive , CD4+ lymphocyte count > = 400/mm3 document within three month screen visit Subject ( legally acceptable representative , case study participant > = 10 < 18 year age ) inform nature study , agree provision , sign date informed consent form approve appropriate IRB/IEC Baxter The subject receive factor VIII product rAHFPFM upon completion Baxter protocol 069901 The subject develop inhibitor factor VIII , measure central laboratory , Baxter protocol 069901 . An inhibitor define Bethesda titer > 1.0 , Bethesda titer < 1.0 , confirmation use Nijmegen modification Bethesda assay titer > 0.6 The subject schedule receive immunomodulating drug antiretroviral chemotherapy ( e.g. , ainterferon , steroid ) course study The subject identify investigator unable unwilling cooperate study procedure
